name: RemoveCustomEnvironment
description:
Remove a specified custom environment from a project.

This tool removes a custom environment from a project, excluding 'Production' or 'Preview'. Use it when you need to delete a specific environment from a Vercel project.

parameters.name: project_identifier_or_name
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name to target the environment removal.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: custom_environment_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom environment within the project to be removed.

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the team to make the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the team on whose behalf to perform the request.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: delete_unassigned_environment_variables
parameters.description: Delete environment variables that are not assigned to any environments when set to true.

value_schema.description: Delete Environment Variables that are not assigned to any environments.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: environmentSlugOrId
parameters.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: deleteUnassignedEnvironmentVariables
parameters.description: Delete Environment Variables that are not assigned to any environments.

value_schema.description: Delete Environment Variables that are not assigned to any environments.
